item.title: P-Mod room (taken from RuneScape!) [Delta | 317/377]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Vazzily, post:23, topic:452232”]I don’t even get what the reputation means to be honest, what’s the difference whether I have 1 or 200?
I sometimes see the people tend to not download a server release in the server downloads board if the user who released it has a low reputation and the server looks too good to be done by such a person, however I don’t think that automatically means it’s a virus or anything.

I just noticed my reputation went to 48 or whatever it is right now, it was 9 before I made this thread. But I don’t see what it does now lol. I’m just glad I can be in a RSPS Community and learn a bit of coding/share my experience no matter what my reputation is.[/quote]

Protip: Instead of using the word “coding”, say “programming”.

Reputation means nothing, don’t even worry about it. Just contribute to the community and be nice.

Read full topic

item.title: P-Mod room (taken from RuneScape!) [Delta | 317/377]
item.dc:creator: @Vazzily Vazzily
item.description:
@Vazzily wrote:

I don’t even get what the reputation means to be honest, what’s the difference whether I have 1 or 200?
I sometimes see the people tend to not download a server release in the server downloads board if the user who released it has a low reputation and the server looks too good to be done by such a person, however I don’t think that automatically means it’s a virus or anything.

I just noticed my reputation went to 48 or whatever it is right now, it was 9 before I made this thread. But I don’t see what it does now lol. I’m just glad I can be in a RSPS Community and learn a bit of coding/share my experience no matter what my reputation is.

item.title: P-Mod room (taken from RuneScape!) [Delta | 317/377]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:20, topic:452232”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=555117.msg4066285#msg4066285 date=1343920614]
On MoparScape, we believe in either you do it right or you don’t. The respected people in this community will tell you that rep means nothing, however, it usually does mean that they’ve spent at least some time inside some form of programming language and are pretty knowledgeable about it.

Just work hard, explain all of your code and don’t be borderline retarded and you’ll fit in fine.
[/quote]

I can confirm that Reputation means absolutely nothing. I had 200 Reputation within my first 24 hours.[/quote]^^^^^^^^^^^^^ lol 120ish within the first hour after I made an introduction in general

oh and…

[quote=“Ruby, post:19, topic:452232”]On MoparScape, we believe in either you do it right or you don’t. The respected people in this community will tell you that rep means nothing, however, it usually does mean that they’ve spent at least some time inside some form of programming language and are pretty knowledgeable about it.

Just work hard, explain all of your code and don’t be borderline retarded and you’ll fit in fine.[/quote]I’m the exception to this rule cause I’m an idiot <3

item.title: P-Mod room (taken from RuneScape!) [Delta | 317/377]
item.dc:creator: @Vazzily Vazzily
item.description:
@Vazzily wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:16, topic:452232”]I actually really like this idea.

Congratulations on your first code, whoever you are.

I still think I’m about the only person on here to write a shitty tutorial and not get flamed by someone.

Inb4someone finds and flames.[/quote]

Really nice of you. Alot of users on here actually took Java lessons or something like that, spend time reading Java books/guides and all that, I myself only worked like 2-3 hours in total with java coding, and I said myself that that tutorial content is pure shit, but I didn’t expect so much hate actually.

However, thanks for everyones feedback.

item.title: P-Mod room (taken from RuneScape!) [Delta | 317/377]
item.dc:creator: @Vazzily Vazzily
item.description:
@Vazzily wrote:

Travas:

The table in the real Mod room has clickable options etc

I already said that in the OP.

[quote=“silabgarza, post:4, topic:452232”]extremely basic. simple object clicking
and not the real mod room
the mod room wasn’t added until about 474 i believe
this is just under varrock west bank by the looks of it[/quote]

First Code ever, ofc its basic. Or was your first self made code full working dungeoneering?
Not the real mod room: I know, and I even said that.
This is just under varrock west bank: I said that, why are you writing that? Anything else you can do other than repeating what I said in a hate-way?

Team_Rocket:

So… you made a teleport to the Varrock West Bank?

Yes, but with playerRights >= 1, the old Lumbridge Guide dialogue is still there for normal users, and I made the stairs lead back and all that, so more than just a teleport. (y)
